channel.title: PDF on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in PDF on Some Title

item.title: Make a calculation drill print
item.description: #Introduction I made a calculation drill generation program to make a self-study print for elementary school lower grades. Randomly create mathematical formulas with python and convert to pdf with A4 paper size. Print the created file at home or at a convenience store, and if the child learns for himself, the purpose is achieved. environment Ubuntu 18.04 [Using WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux) on Windows 10] python3.6 Install ReportLab In order to print the generated formula, use the library for Report PDF, ReportLab.
